verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Praise Him under open skies newline Everthing breathing praising God newline In the company, of all who love the King

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I will dance, I will sing newline It could be heavenly newline Turn the music loud, lift my voice and shout newline From where I am newline From where I've been newline He's been there with me newline He's built a monument

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: His very people newline So let his people newline Sing, sing, sing

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: And its so wonderful newline Just to be here now

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Praise Him under open skies newline Everthing breathing prasing God newline In the company of all who love the King

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Praise him under open skies newline Everthing breathing praisin God newline In the company , of all who love the King newline Let us dance, Let us sing newline it could be heavenly newline Turn the music loud and sing

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Lift your voice to Heaven newline Lift your head and sing newline to the one who gave His love newline This is our offering newline Lift your voice to heaven newline Lift your Head and sing newline to the One who gave His son newline here our lives we bring
